headline: Kristin Richardson Jordan says she was told not to tweet about shot NYPD cops
author: Rich Calder
sentences: A woke City Council member who has called the NYPD the Big Apple’s “biggest gang” is under fire for tweeting about a community garden instead of showing sympathy following Friday night’s ambush shooting in her Harlem district that left a rookie cop dead and another officer clinging for life.

“I have been asked not to tweet about it
